editorialNotes.tagline: New ways to sketch and animate
editorialNotes.standard: With stunning filters and thousands of importable brushes, this app lets you generate high-calibre artwork at a blistering pace. It supports pressure sensitivity and Apple Pencil – as well as iCloud Drive – so sharing your work is incredibly simple.
editorialNotes.short: This super-intuitive app makes it easy to paint your masterpiece.

editorialNotes.standard: Wherever you are on your filmmaking journey, this multitrack video editor meets you there. Its features are rarely found in an iPad app, and everything’s accessible through an intuitive touch interface.
editorialNotes.short: Apply transitions, effects and more with these powerful editing tools.
Help yourself resist distractions from your device.
Create a mind map wherever you are and whenever you want.

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone needs a task manager – and this Apple Design Award winner is adaptable enough for anyone. Organising items is as simple as dragging them where you want them, and the Magic Plus button makes it easy to add to-dos from anywhere in the app.
editorialNotes.short: Organise class projects, assignments and daily to-do lists.

editorialNotes.standard: With a suite of powerful tools, touch-screen controls, gorgeous templates and customisable effects, this full-featured editor is in a class of its own. Plus, with iCloud Drive, you can edit on your iPhone, iPad or Mac, wherever you are.
editorialNotes.short: Make your pictures shine with this set of photography tools.
Elevate your creativity through colourful caleidoscopic designs.
See internal organs in action: lungs breathe, muscles bend and nerves respond to a pinprick.

ios.subtitle: Kids Baby Games for Girls Boys
Install all the fonts you need
